TheWord.ScriptureReference: Genesis 16:3, Ruth 1:4, Genesis 24:62, Proverbs 26, Psalms 58, 1 Peter 4:2
TheWord.Title: We didn't leave till ten, been through the years I have spent all my life.

Remember.Commentary: Ishmael, Abraham's first born, is the progrenitor of 12 Princes. Esau, Isaac's first born, is the father of the Dukes.
Remember.ScriptureReference: Genesis 17:20, Genesis 11:1-9, Genesis 16:11-16, Genesis 21:1-21, Genesis 25:12-18, Genesis 28:8-9, Genesis 36

Remember.Commentary: Pass the flower of His age. O so pe ohun fe bi mo. Pa fu e. Oluwa lo lu fe agutan mi.

BibleWord.Commentary: Sarai Abram's wife took Hagar her maid the Egyptian, after Abram had dwelt ten years in the land of Canaan, and gave her to her husband Abram to be his wife (Genesis 16:3). They took them wives of the women of Moab; the name of the one was Orpah, and the name of the other Ruth: and they dwelled there about ten years (Ruth 1:4).

AlphabetSequence.Word: We didn't leave till ten, been through the years I have spent all my life.
